name: Four Studies of Heads Drawn over a Copy of Saint John the Evangelist by Correggio (recto); Three Studies of Men (verso)
description: Four Studies of Heads Drawn over a Copy of Saint John the Evangelist by Correggio (recto); Three Studies of Men (verso); Annibale Carracci (Italian, 1560 - 1609), or Lodovico Carracci (Italian, 1555 - 1619); Italy; about 1585; Black chalk (recto); black and red chalk (verso); 27.6 × 20.6 cm (10 7/8 × 8 1/8 in.); 85.GB.218; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
